dmca.title: [EV1-C1532208L] UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please be advised that our customer has notified us that access to the
content that was referenced in your DMCA complaint (attached below) has
been disabled.


Legal Response Team


-----Original Message-----

390 Benmar Suite 200
Houston, TX 77060 
 
support@scanlover.com; admin@evl.net; abuse@ev1servers.net; noc@ev1.net 
 
 
        Re:         UNAUTHORIZED USE OF NATASHA YI'S IMAGE 
        http://www.scanlover.com 
                         
Dear Sir or Madam: 
 
        This letter is being written to you on behalf of our client
Natasha Yi.  Ms. Yi is the owner of rights of publicity and privacy in
her name and image.  
 
        Notwithstanding this, it has come to our attention that a web
site located at "http://scanlover.com/natasha-yi,"for which you are a
service provider, contains unauthorized reproductions of Ms. Yi's image.

The distribution of these images, as well as the use of Ms. Yi's name in
metatags and/or use of Ms. Yi's name to increase traffic on this web
site, violates Ms. Yi's rights of publicity and privacy. Further, based
on the fact that some of the images on the above-referenced web site
appear to have been illegally copied from copyrighted photographs, this
web site may also infringe the rights of various copyright owners. 
 
        On behalf of Ms. Yi, we request your assistance in the removal
of all unauthorized depictions of Ms. Yi from this web site and any
other sites for which you act as an Internet service provider.  As you
may know, failure to remove such infringing content from this web site
may expose you to liability for contributory infringement of Ms. Yi's
rights.  Please contact me to discuss this matter at your earliest
convenience. 
  
        Nothing in this letter shall be construed as a waiver or
relinquishment of any right or remedy possessed by Natasha Yi or any
other affected party, all of which are expressly reserved. 
 
Very truly yours,
/s/
David K. Caplan
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP
